body_html: Perhaps the absence of curand in master/third_party/gpus/cuda/BUILD is causing this? I'm having a similar issue; I can't see how this could work through Bazel without curand being configured here at a minimum.
body_text: Perhaps the absence of curand in master/third_party/gpus/cuda/BUILD is causing this? I'm having a similar issue; I can't see how this could work through Bazel without curand being configured here at a minimum.
body: Perhaps the absence of `curand` in [`master/third_party/gpus/cuda/BUILD`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/gpus/cuda/BUILD) is causing this? I'm having a similar issue; I can't see how this could work through Bazel without `curand` being configured [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/gpus/cuda/BUILD#L161) at a minimum.
